des:
Major update to the Skill. Thanks for all of your reviews and support. We have updated the skill with a more smooth and fault-free experience. We are continuing the legacy of the previous skill with a more advanced and smooth voice experience. Now you can keep track of all the stories by the episode number. We have added 200+ stories in this skill. Additionally, the Alexa skill will keep track of the last session so that you can continue listening to the previous story.


Panchatantra will take you on an adventurous ride by narrating stories. An example of mystic India, Panchatantra tales are the oldest surviving stories of mankind, surviving for centuries, from mouth to mouth, before they were documented. You will love the lucid pace of the stories, and they always make for great bedtime or storytelling sessions. 

Steps for using the skill:

Session 1:
User: Alexa, open new hindi stories
Alexa: Starting World of Panchtantra - <audio> - You can say, play the stories, to begin.
User: Play / Begin the stories
Alexa: This is Episode <number>
<Alexa completes the story or user interruption>
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, open new hindi stories
Alexa: <audio> You were listening to Episode <number>, Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to the first episode and you can ask Alexa to step forward by saying Alexa, next> You are listening to the Panchtantra stories. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to the Panchtantra stories. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.


Stories are narrated in Hindi

Once invoked, Alexa will automatically start the conversation and play one story. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the Stories of PanchTantra: 100s of Indian stories. To start again on finishing one story, you can ask Alexa to open again.

We are continuously adding more and more handpicked stories which could bring more valuable to life education among people. 

------------------------------------------
Disclaimer
------------------------------------------
This “PanchTantra: 1000s of New Hindi Stories! ” Alexa skill is intended for fun and entertainment purposes only. It contains audios in Indian local language ‘Hindi’. Users of this skill are fully aware of the local language and accepted to play the stories with their own knowledge and experience.

When you reach the bottom of the playlist, try saying, Alexa, start over or Alexa, shuffle

Advice: The skill contains some parts of violence and rash words in Hindi which makes it suitable for a larger age group of children. (13+)
